title: Plan a Satellite's Orbit
description: A mission planner needs to design a stable orbit for a new Earth observation satellite that provides coverage of specific regions.

tasks.description: Define the mission requirements, including target observation areas, revisit time, and desired resolution.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists all key mission parameters.

tasks.description: Calculate the optimal orbital parameters (altitude, inclination, eccentricity) to meet the mission requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates a set of orbital parameters that satisfy all constraints.

tasks.description: Simulate the chosen orbit over a 10-year lifespan to ensure long-term stability and predict station-keeping maneuver frequency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a report showing the orbit's stability and fuel budget for station-keeping.
